name: scc-accountability
description: St. Clair County Sheriff Accountability Project

scripts.dev: npm run dev:index && concurrently "npm run tailwind:watch" "hugo server --buildDrafts"
scripts.dev:index: npm run tailwind:build && hugo --gc && npm run pagefind:dev
scripts.build:site: npm run tailwind:build && hugo --gc --minify && npm run pagefind
scripts.build:site:preview: npm run tailwind:build && hugo --gc --minify --buildDrafts --buildFuture && npm run pagefind
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:site && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build:site:preview && wrangler deploy --env preview
